title: Drawing, "Design for Chicken Point Cabin, Hayden Lake, Idaho:  West and South Elevations", February 15, 2001
markings: Stamped in black ink, lower right:  Olson Sunberg Kundig Allen Architects/108 First Avenue South Fourth Floor/Seattle, Washington 98104
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper drawing, lower right: check west elevation; lower drawing, clockwise from top: overhang beam, sbpc above, raft below, 'slim' roof pan, check south elevation.
provenance: Tom Kundig; Olson Kundig Architects, Seattle, WA, 2001-March 2010
description: Two views of Kundig's weekend cabin in mountain district of Idaho.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Chicken Point Cabin, Hayden Lake, Idaho:  West and South Elevations", February 15, 2001.
February 15, 2001. Graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Tom Kundig. 2010-10-1.
